summary: Innovative bilingual sales executive with more than 6 years of sales experience in Mexico and USA, successful at acquiring, expanding and managing key corporate accounts.

experience.title: Business Development Manager
experience.description: Responsible for selling hydraulic & pneumatic equipment in Mexico and USA to clients in Energy, Chemical & Mining industries. Met annual quotas of $1.4M USD. Led US client outreach, developed sales plans to expand client base outside Mexico. Scheduled 2-3 in-person meetings with potential US customers quarterly. Managed accounts in energy (e.g., PEMEX) and metallurgical/chemical (e.g., MET-Mex Pe√±aoles). Developed business plans to identify opportunities and upsell products/services. Arranged follow-up calls/meetings with Top 50 accounts bi-monthly to retain customers. Generated sales reports/forecasts and prepared quotations to meet customer needs and support collections.

experience.title: Sales Representative
experience.description: Obtained new accounts by selling financial products and services to consumers and businesses. Consistently achieved sales quota by making 50-60 outbound cold calls per day. Maintained relationships to offer best customer service and personalized financial advice.

experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.description: Designed banners and brochures for annual events. Translated documents and promotional material from English to Spanish.

education.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration - International Business
